name: Hotel Grand Park
languages: HTML, CSS, React, MongoDB, NodeJS, Express, React-Bootstrap

description: Any user can login to this website with google authentication system. If the user is not logged in, he will not be able to accept our service. If user logs in to our website, he will be able to place an order and see his order list.
